SummaryEnglish: Manatsu Natsuumi is a first-year junior high school student born and raised on a small island. On the day she moves from the island, She meets Laura, a mermaid girl who has come to the earth alone in search of the legendary warrior, PreCure. Laura's hometown, Grand Ocean, is attacked by a witch who lives in the dark depths of the ocean, and all of their motivational power is taken away. It is said that if the motivational power of humans is also taken away, the world will be in deep trouble. Laura is captured by the witch's servant, and Manatsu transforms into Cure Summer to save her.
TitleJapanese: トロピカル〜ジュ！プリキュア
SummaryJapanese:
とある少女・夏海まなつは、小さな島・南乃島から都会のあおぞら市へと引っ越し、春から中学校に通う中学1年生。引っ越してきた日、まなつは伝説の戦士であるプリキュアを探そうとやって来た人魚の少女・ローラと出会う。その人魚の故郷・グランオーシャンは、暗い海の底に住んでいるあとまわしの魔女による襲撃を受けてしまい、やる気パワーを全て奪われてしまった。人間のやる気パワーまで奪われてしまうと、世界は大変なことになるという。ローラが地上に現れた後、あとまわしの魔女の召使いもそこに現れて大ピンチとなる。

まなつは「わたしの『今、1番大事なこと』！それは…！」と、プリキュアであるキュアサマーに変身する。

1.TitleEnglish: Tropical-Rouge! Pretty Cure the Movie: Petite Dive! Collaboration Dance Party!
1.TitleJapanese: 映画 トロピカル〜ジュ！プリキュア プチ とびこめ！コラボ♡ダンスパーティ！

2.TitleEnglish: Tropical-Rouge! Pretty Cure the Movie: The Snow Princess and the Miraculous Ring!
2.TitleJapanese: 映画 トロピカル〜ジュ！プリキュア 雪のプリンセスと奇跡の指輪！
2.SummaryJapanese: ある日、まなつたちのもとに雪の王国・シャンティアから招待状がとどいた。新しく女王になるシャロンを祝う式で、まなつたちはみんなで雪の世界へ！しかし、とつぜん謎のかいぶつがあらわれて、みんなを王国にとじこめてしまい大ピンチに…!?

1.TitleEnglish: Tropica-shine! Motivation to the Max! Cure Summer!
1.SummaryEnglish: Natsuumi Manatsu is a first year middle school student who is moving to Aozora City to attend middle school in Spring after being born and raised on a small island all her life. However, when she moves to Aozora City, she meets the mermaid Laura, who says she is looking for the legendary warriors, Pretty Cure.
1.TitleJapanese: トロピカれ！やる気全開！キュアサマー！
1.SummaryJapanese: 小さな島で生まれ育ち、春から都会のあおぞら市の中学校に通う中学1年生の夏海まなつ。あおぞら市へと引っ越してきたその日、まなつは伝説の戦士・プリキュアを探しているという人魚のローラと衝撃の出会いをする。

2.TitleEnglish: Manatsu and Laura! What's More Important?
2.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu has started attending Aozora Middle School. Laura follows her in search of a new Pretty Cure candidate. However, the students of the school take notice of her!!
2.TitleJapanese: まなつとローラ！どっちの大事が一番大事？
2.SummaryJapanese: あおぞら中学校に通い始めるまなつ。新たなプリキュア候補を探しに人魚のローラもついて行くが、退屈のあまりまなつに内緒で抜け出してしまう。ローラは生徒たちに見つかりそうになり大ピンチに!

3.TitleEnglish: Believe Yourself. Super Cute Cure Coral!
3.SummaryEnglish: Sango accidentally comes across Laura who was in the aquarium's pool. Lacking self confidence, Sango just goes with the flow of things. But when she is moved by Manatsu and Laura's honest words about this...
3.TitleJapanese: 自分を信じて！キュートいっぱい！キュアコーラル！
3.SummaryJapanese: さんごはまなつたちと訪れた水族館で、偶然人魚のローラと出会う。自信がなく、自然と周りに合わせてしまうさんごは、「自分のかわいいが信じられなくてどうするのよ」と言うローラの言葉が胸に刺さり...。

4.TitleEnglish: Cure Papaya Pops Out! This Is My Tale!
4.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu, Sango and Laura meet Ichinose Minori, a second year middle school student who knows a lot about the legends and stories surrounding mermaids. Because of past situations, Minori struggles to take a step forward. But then...
4.TitleJapanese: はじけるキュアパパイヤ！これが私の物語！
4.SummaryJapanese: まなつとさんごは、図書室でプリキュアや人魚に関する伝説を調べるうち、人魚の伝説や物語に詳しい中学2年生の一之瀬みのりと出会う。過去の出来事からなかなか一歩踏み出せないみのりだったが...。

5.TitleEnglish: Here Comes Senpai! Burn, Cure Flamingo!
5.SummaryEnglish: Takizawa Asuka is a third year middle school student with a strong sense of justice. Manatsu and Laura ask her to become a Pretty Cure after she helped them...
5.TitleJapanese: 先輩参上！燃えろ！キュアフラミンゴ！
5.SummaryJapanese: 正義感が強く姉御肌の中学3年生・滝沢あすか。怖い人から助けてくれたこときっかけに、まなつとローラはあすかをプリキュアにスカウトするが、あすかはそっけない。そこに生徒会長の白鳥百合子が現れ...。

6.TitleEnglish: It Starts Now! The Tropical Club!
6.SummaryEnglish: The girls have found an empty room and finally formed a club! First up, they got to figure out what their club does. However, Manatsu and the others are struggling to get permission from the student council president without knowing what they want to do... But then a graduate of Aozora Middle School arrives, looking for an ornament they hid 10 years ago...
6.TitleJapanese: 今はじまる！その名は、トロピカる部！
6.SummaryJapanese: 部室も確保し、いよいよ部活動スタート。しかし、活動内容がはっきりしないため生徒会から許可が下りず、苦戦するまなつたち。そんななか、10年前に宝物を隠した置物を探しているという卒業生がやってきて...。

7.TitleEnglish: Here It Comes! Sea Fairy Kururun!
7.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu and the rest of the Tropical Club are out running when they find Kururun, a sea fairy, washed up on the beach. It seems that Kururun has lost an important item for Laura, which was entrusted to her by the Queen of Grand Ocean...
7.TitleJapanese: やってくる！海の妖精くるるん
7.SummaryJapanese: まなつたちはランニング中、砂浜に打ち上げられていた海の妖精・くるるんを発見する。どうやらくるるんは、グランオーシャンの女王様から託されたローラへの大事な届け物をなくしてしまったようで...。

8.TitleEnglish: Our First Club Activity! Tropica-shining Lunches!
8.SummaryEnglish: The girls want to make lunch for their busy mothers. That's when Manatsu has an idea to have "making lunch boxes" as their first club activity. Everyone then decides to make a dish based on Kururun.
8.TitleJapanese: 初めての部活！お弁当でトロピカっちゃえ！
8.SummaryJapanese: 「忙しいお母さんに代わって自分もお弁当を作りたい!」と思ったまなつは、トロピカる部の最初の活動として、みんなでお弁当作りを提案する。早速みんなで、くるるんをイメージしたくるるん弁当を作ることに。

9.TitleEnglish: Makeup is Magic? Get Tropical with Movie!
9.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu is excited to hear that a movie is being filmed at Aozora Middle School, and wants the Tropical Club to star as extras. But she then happens to come across one of the actresses who is struggling with her new role...
9.TitleJapanese: メイクは魔法？映画でトロピカる！
9.SummaryJapanese: あおぞら中学が映画撮影のロケに使われると聞き、大興奮のまなつ。トロピカる部でエキストラ出演したいと息巻くなか、偶然、その映画に出演する若手女優と出会う。彼女は新しく演じる役に悩んでいて...。

10.TitleEnglish: Combined Motivation! Pretty Cure Mix Tropical!
10.SummaryEnglish: With midterm exams approaching, Manatsu is having trouble studying even though her quiz results were really bad. Then, Manatsu's Motivation Power is stolen by the stronger Zenzen Yaraneeda...
10.TitleJapanese: やる気重ねて！プリキュア！ミックストロピカル！！
10.SummaryJapanese: 中間テストが迫っていた。まなつは小テストの結果が散々だったにも関わらず、勉強が一向にはかどらない。そんななか、まなつは強くなったゼンゼンヤラネーダにやる気パワーを奪われてしまい...。

11.TitleEnglish: Get Excited! Sand Art by the Beach!
11.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club decides to hold a sand art competition with the other clubs at Aozora Middle School. However, just as the sand arts are about to be finished, it starts to rain. Manatsu tries her best to protect everyone's work but...
11.TitleJapanese: もりあがれ！海辺のサンドアート！
11.SummaryJapanese: トロピカる部の主催で、部活対抗のサンドアート大会が開催される。ビーチでそれぞれの部活が作業を進めるが、完成が見え始めた頃に雨が降り始めてしまう。みんなの作品を守ろうとするまなつは...。

12.TitleEnglish: Confiscated! The Aqua Pot's Not Allowed?!
12.SummaryEnglish: The Disciplinary Committee have been going to every club room to see if the rumor about a mermaid being at the school is true. When they suspect the Tropical Club of hiding something, Laura's Mermaid Aqua Pot is confiscated...
12.TitleJapanese: 没収！アクアポットは校則違反！？
12.SummaryJapanese: 「学校に人魚がいる」という噂を知り、各部室を調べ回る風紀委員たち。そんななか、トロピカる部が「隠し事をしている」と疑う風紀委員長によって、ローラのアクアポットが没収されてしまう...。

13.TitleEnglish: School Broadcast Flurry! Hit It, Mermaid's Song!
13.SummaryEnglish: During the school's lunchtime broadcast, the topic of mermaids are discussed. But when Manatsu learns that the broadcasting club members are frustrated over no one listening to them, she comes up with a plan.
13.TitleJapanese: ドタバタ校内放送！響け、人魚の歌！
13.SummaryJapanese: お昼休みの校内放送で流れた人魚の話題をきっかけに、トロピカる部で校内放送に出演したいと申し出るまなつ。ところが、見学の日に急きょ本番に参加することになり、ドタバタ続きで放送は大混乱!

14.TitleEnglish: Leave It To Us! Tropica-shining Preschool Teachers!
14.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club is getting work experience at a preschool. Laura befriends Wataru, who is reading about bugs by himself. But when a Zenzen Yaraneeda appears, Wataru refuses to run away because he is too worried about a swallowtail butterfly's chrysalis...
14.TitleJapanese: おまかせ！保育園でトロピカ先生！
14.SummaryJapanese: 保育士体験にやってきたトロピカる部。ローラは周りの誰とも遊ばずに昆虫図鑑を読みふけるワタルと仲良くなる。そこにゼンゼンヤラネーダが現れるが、ワタルはアゲハチョウのサナギが心配で逃げられず...。

15.TitleEnglish: Minori is Laura, Laura is Minori?!
15.SummaryEnglish: When Minori is suddenly sucked into the Mermaid Aqua Pot, Laura dives in to save her. But when they come out of the Mermaid Aqua Pot, they two girls quickly realize they have switched bodies! The duo are very confused but decide to enjoy a life they don't usually get to experience...
15.TitleJapanese: みのりがローラで、ローラがみのり！？
15.SummaryJapanese: 突然、アクアポットに吸い込まれてしまったみのり。助けようとローラがアクアポットに飛び込むが、アクアポットから出てくると、2人の中身が入れ替わっていた。普段は体験できない生活を楽しむ2人だったが...。

16.TitleEnglish: The Witch's Trap! Laura Was Captured!
16.SummaryEnglish: With Summer vacation approaching, the Tropical Club members have been getting to know each other better through their club activities. However, Laura has been acting rather strange lately. Manatsu and the others notice this and try to talk to her, but...
16.TitleJapanese: 魔女の罠！囚われたローラ！
16.SummaryJapanese: 夏休みも近づき、部活動を通じてさらに仲を深めていくトロピカる部。ところが、最近ローラの様子が少し変。そんなローラの様子を察したまなつたちは、図書室で「人魚姫」を読んでいるローラに声をかけるが...。

17.TitleEnglish: Mermaid's Miracle Transform! Cure La Mer!
17.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu and her friends are searching for Laura who was captured, when they come across a cruise ship that was turned into a Zenzen Yarane-da. Meanwhile, Laura escapes the Witch's Mansion, and finds her friends on the cruise ship. That's when a miracle occurs and Laura transforms into Cure La Mer!
17.TitleJapanese: 人魚の奇跡！変身！キュアラメール！
17.SummaryJapanese: 捕らえられたローラを捜すまなつたちは、海の上でゼンゼンヤラネーダに襲われた豪華客船を見つける。一方、何とかあとまわしの魔女の屋敷を脱出したローラは、まなつたちのもとへと駆けつける。

18.TitleEnglish: I'll Walk! I'll Swim! Laura's First Day of School!
18.SummaryEnglish: Now a human, Laura attends Aozora Middle School. However, she is quickly confused. Then, she is invited to participate in the swim team's trial meeting, and is overjoyed to have the chance to play an active role...
18.TitleJapanese: 歩くよ！泳ぐよ！ローラの初登校！
18.SummaryJapanese: 人間の姿になり、あおぞら中学に通い始めるローラ。しかし、慣れない人間界の授業に戸惑うばかり。そんななか、水泳部の部長からメドレーリレーの選手選考会に誘われたローラは、大喜びで参加するが...。

19.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club is participating in a campaign set up by the Newspaper Club to investigate the scary ghost stories and seven wonders of the school. While exploring an old mansion in the mountains behind the school, a doll in the room suddenly starts talking to Manatsu...
19.TitleJapanese: まなつパニック！　学校の七不思議！
19.SummaryJapanese: 新聞部が主催する「学校の本当に怖い怪談・七不思議大調査キャンペーン」に参加することになったトロピカる部。裏山の古いお屋敷を探索していると、部屋にあった人形が突然、まなつに話しかけてきて...。

20.TitleEnglish: Great Detective Minorin! The Missing Melon Bread Case!
20.SummaryEnglish: The Premium Tropical Melon Bread, a limited version of the snack, is being sold at the school! Manatsu manages to buy one, but when she leaves the Tropical Club room for a moment, it disappears! Minori then takes on the role of a detective, and the Tropical Club come together to hunt down the missing Melon Bread.
20.TitleJapanese: 名探偵みのりん！消えたメロンパン事件！
20.SummaryJapanese: 学校の購買で売っている超レア限定品のプレミアムトロピカルメロンパン。そのメロンパンをやっとの思いで手に入れたまなつだが、部室に置いてちょっと目を離した隙に、突然なくなってしまい...。

21.TitleEnglish: Summer Break! Tropical Club's Camp Plan!
21.SummaryEnglish: Summer vacation from tomorrow. Manatsu's words, "I want to have a training camp," led the Tropical Club to hold a training camp in Manatsu's hometown, Minaminoshima. While everyone is making bookmarks for the training camp and planning the schedule, Manatsu will showcase a lot of recommendations from Minami Nojima, such as caves where treasures are hidden, secret beaches, and island festivals.
21.TitleJapanese: 夏休み！トロピカる部の合宿計画！
21.SummaryJapanese: 夏休みに入り、トロピカる部は夏合宿をすることに。場所は、まなつの生まれ育った故郷・南乃島。合宿のしおりを作り、楽しみで待ちきれない気持ちで出発の朝を迎えるが、そこにゼンゼンヤラネーダが現れ...。

22.TitleEnglish: A Secret Grand Adventure! Find The Mermaid's Treasure!
22.SummaryEnglish: It's the first day of the training camp on Minamino Island. The Tropical Club have fun at the secret beach that Manatsu recommended. After being told about the mermaid treasure, the girls go to investigate the cave, when they lose sight of Laura...
22.TitleJapanese: ヒミツの大冒険！人魚の宝を探せ！
22.SummaryJapanese: 南乃島での合宿初日。トロピカる部は、まなつお勧めの美しい秘密のビーチを満喫する。その後、島の長老から人魚の宝の話を聞き、北の浜の洞窟にやってきたが、途中でローラがはぐれてしまい...。

23.TitleEnglish: The Minamino Festival. Laura, Tell Us Your Wish!
23.SummaryEnglish: The training camp on Minamino Island is coming to an end. Manatsu and her friends participate in the island's festival, the "Minamino Festival," where they throw rocks with their wishes written on them into the sea. But for some reason, Laura is the only one who wants to keep her wish a secret...
23.TitleJapanese: 南乃祭り！　教えて、ローラの願いごと！
23.SummaryJapanese: 南乃島での合宿も残りわずか。島のお祭りである南乃祭りに浴衣姿で参加したまなつたちは、願い事を書いた石を海に投げ入れる。ところが、なぜかローラだけは自分の願い事を内緒にしようとしていて...。

24.TitleEnglish: Hot Battle! Tropical Club vs. Student Council
24.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club accidentally interrupts a TV crew currently filming Yuriko talking about Aozora Middle School when their banner knocks the crew and Yuriko into the fountain. With the Tropical Club's activities about to be suspended, the TV crew recommends the Student Council and the Tropical Club versus each other in a quiz show...
24.TitleJapanese: 熱血バトル!　トロピカる部VS生徒会
24.SummaryJapanese: あおぞら中学校にきていたテレビ番組の取材を邪魔してしまったトロピカる部。部活動の停止処分を懸けて、生徒会とクイズ番組で対決することになるが、最終問題でまさかの展開が待ち受けていた。

25.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Sakuragawa, the homeroom teacher of Class 1-5, looks more nervous than the students before Class Observation Day. To everyone's surprise, her father will also be there to observe the class. Manatsu and the others wonder if he has come to assess Ms. Sakuragawa's ability as a teacher, so Manatsu gets her class together to support their teacher.
25.TitleJapanese: 桜川先生パワーアップ大作戦！
25.SummaryJapanese: 授業参観日を前に、生徒よりも緊張した様子の桜川先生。何と先生の父親も参観にくるつもりなのだという。「先生の教師としての力を見定めにくるのでは?」と考えたまなつたちは、先生に協力しようとするが...。

26.TitleEnglish: Sky, Clear Up! Shiny Meteor Shower Night!
26.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club hears that a meteor shower comes every 50 years and decides to gather the whole student body to watch it. And despite it being cloudy on the day, someone appears to bring in the sunshine...
26.TitleJapanese: 晴れわたれ！キラキラ☆流星群の夜
26.SummaryJapanese: 「50年に一度の流星群がやってくる」と聞き、学校のみんなを集めて、流星群を見る会を開催することを決めたトロピカる部。しかし、当日の天気は曇り模様だった。晴れを呼び込むために現れたのは...。

27.TitleEnglish: Disappearing Motivation? The Strange Aquarium Tour!
27.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club visit the Aozora Aquarium to participate in the new "Dolphin Petting Corner". However, they notice that many customers look sad. So they decide to participate in the night tour so they can investigate.
27.TitleJapanese: やる気が消える？水族館ふしぎツアー！
27.SummaryJapanese: 新たに始まったイルカの触れあいコーナーに参加しようと、水族館にやってきたまなつたち。しかし、元気のないお客さんが多いことに気づいたまなつたちは、ナイトツアーに参加し調査に乗り出すことに。

28.TitleEnglish: Cultural Festival! Do Aozora Makeup Together!
28.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club run a "Aozora Make-Up Class" at the school festival. The club is short on staff when the scheduled broadcast interview starts, so Minori is left to take care of everything behind the scenes.
28.TitleJapanese: 文化祭！力あわせて、あおぞらメイク！
28.SummaryJapanese: 文化祭であおぞらメイク教室を開催するトロピカる部。文化祭当日、メイク教室には大勢のお客さんがやってくるが、生放送の取材が入るタイミングで人手が足りなくなってしまい、裏方のみのりが対応することに。

29.TitleEnglish: The Revived Legend! Pretty Cure, Charm Up!
29.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu meets the "Legendary Pretty Cure" in her dream. According to Laura, the Legendary Pretty Cure saved the world of mermaids and humans a long time ago. Meanwhile, multiple Chou Zettai Yarane-da are born from water, and appear throughout the town.
29.TitleJapanese: 甦る伝説！プリキュアおめかしアップ！
29.SummaryJapanese: 夢の中で伝説のプリキュアに出会うまなつ。ローラによると、大昔に人魚と人間の世界を救ったのが伝説のプリキュアだという。そんななか、街のあちこちに水から生まれた超ゼッタイヤラネーダが出現し...。

30.TitleEnglish: Election! Laura for Student Council President?!
30.SummaryEnglish: Laura takes part in the election to decide Aozora Middle School's next student council president. Despite getting little to no support, Laura doesn't give up, and comes up with ideas for her final speech with the Tropical Club. However, on the day of the final speech, a Chou Zettai Yarane-da appears...
30.TitleJapanese: 大選挙！ローラが生徒会長！？
30.SummaryJapanese: 次の生徒会長を決める選挙に立候補するローラ。なかなか支持を得られないなか、最終演説に向けて諦めずにトロピカる部みんなでアイデアを話しあう。しかし最終演説当日、超ゼッタイヤラネーダが現れて...。

31.TitleEnglish: A Train of Troubles! Asuka's School Trip!
31.SummaryEnglish: Laura and Kururun secretly follow Asuka on her school field trip. Manatsu and the others try to chase after the train, but Numeri just so happens to be on the train as well...
31.TitleJapanese: トラブル列車！あすかの修学旅行！
31.SummaryJapanese: 3年生の修学旅行で寝台列車に乗っているあすか。ふと自分の荷物に目をやると、アクアポットで忍び込んだローラとくるるんの姿が。あすかの乗る列車を追いかけるまなつたちだったが、列車にヌメリーが現れて...。

32.TitleEnglish: Stride down the Runway! Sango's Fashion Show!
32.SummaryEnglish: Sango suddenly decides to participate in her favorite fashion show as a model. However, she is so nervous that she falls down on the runway during rehearsals. Sango is upset about it, thinking she might not belong there, but...
32.TitleJapanese: 駆けろランウェイ！さんごのファッションショー！
32.SummaryJapanese: 急きょモデルとして大好きなファッションショーに出演することになったさんご。ところが緊張のあまり、リハーサル中にランウェイで転んでしまう。「自分は場違いなのかも」と落ち込むさんごだが...。

33.SummaryEnglish: This week's episode is a special edition! There will be 10 stories of the Tropical Club doing something different from usual. Be sure to watch these fun and tropica-shining stories until the very end!
33.SummaryJapanese: 今回の『トロプリ』は特別編。いつもとは違うまなつたちの姿を10本立てでお届け。あとまわしの魔女の屋敷を想像したまなつがおそろしい事実に気づき...。さらに、さんごとあすかが入れ替わって大騒ぎ!

34.TitleEnglish: Dreams Are Infinite! What Will You Be When You Grow Up?
34.SummaryEnglish: When asked the question, "What do you want to be when you grow up?", Manatsu struggles to come up with an answer. On the other hand, Elda, who ran away from the witch's mansion after being scolded, comes to Aozora City...
34.TitleJapanese: 夢は無限大！大人になったら何になる？
34.SummaryJapanese: イベントのテーマ「大人になったら、何になる?」という問いかけに、良い答えが見つからないまなつ。そんななか、しかられてあとまわし魔女の屋敷から家出したエルダが、あおぞら市にやってきて...。

35.SummaryEnglish: While preparing for the Tropical Club's Halloween Party, a Yaraneeda appears and steals everyone's Motivation Power. Cure Summer tries to do Laura's "Motivation Power, Come Back!" sequence, as Laura is out of town at the time. However, the Motivation Power isn't coming back...!!
35.TitleJapanese: わくわくハロウィン！まけるな、まなつ！
35.SummaryJapanese: トロピカる部主催によるハロウィーンパーティの準備中、ヤラネーダが現れみんなのやる気パワーが奪われてしまう。出かけていたローラに代わってまなつが、やる気パワーカムバックをするのだが...。

36.TitleEnglish: We're Here! The Mermaid Kingdom, Grand Ocean!
36.SummaryEnglish: The Mermaid Queen invites Manatsu and her friends to Grand Ocean as she wants them to find the ocean ring. However, when they return to the castle with no clues on its whereabouts, they realize something is wrong with the queen...
36.TitleJapanese: 来たよ！　人魚の国・グランオーシャン！
36.SummaryJapanese: グランオーシャンにやってきたまなつたちは、人魚の女王から「グランオーシャンのどこかにある海のリングを探してほしい」と頼まれる。手掛かりを得られず城に戻ってみると、どこか女王の様子がおかしくて...。

37.TitleEnglish: Mermaid's Memories! Get Back Marine Ring!
37.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu and her friends head back to Grand Ocean to save the real Mermaid Queen. But then they discover a mysterious room filled with memories of mermaids who once interacted with humans. While there, Laura discovers a secret...
37.TitleJapanese: 人魚の記憶！海のリングを取り戻せ！
37.SummaryJapanese: 本物の人魚の女王を助け出そうと再び城に向かったまなつたちは、かつて人間と触れあった人魚たちの記憶が収められた不思議な部屋を発見する。そこでローラは、隠されていた秘密を知ってしまう。

38.TitleEnglish: Get the Win! Asuka's Friendship Smash!
38.SummaryEnglish: Asuka still hasn't decided her career path, despite her love for tennis. Yuriko is participating in a tennis trial to get into the prestigious Phoenix Academy, when she asks Asuka to play against her.
38.TitleJapanese: 決めろ！あすかの友情スマッシュ！
38.SummaryJapanese: テニスへの思いを残しつつも、進路の決まらないあすか。そんななか、名門・フェニックス学院の体験入部に参加していた百合子は、あすかに対戦を持ちかける。しかし試合中、超ゼッタイヤラネーダが現れて...。

39.SummaryEnglish: Sango applies for a modeling audition where Yamabe Yuna, a young actor she met in a movie shoot, is a judge. Although Sango makes it to the final screening, she begins to have doubts about what she really wants to do...
39.TitleJapanese: みつけて！さんごのきらめく舞台ステージ！
39.SummaryJapanese: 以前、映画の撮影で出会った若手俳優・山辺ゆなが審査員を務めるモデルオーディションに自ら応募したさんご。最終審査までたどりついたものの、本当に自分がやりたいことに迷いが生まれ始めて...。

40.TitleEnglish: Spin the Tale! Minori's New Story!
40.SummaryEnglish: The Tropical Club decide to put on a play for the Graduation Festival. Minori begins to rewrite "A Mermaid's Tale" as the script for the play. While she is struggling to make progress, Manatsu and her friends invite her to visit a Papaya Farm...
40.TitleJapanese: 紡げ！　みのりの新たな物語すとーりー！
40.SummaryJapanese: トロピカ卒業フェスティバルが近づき、トロピカる部は演劇を行うことに。みのりは台本の書き直しを始めるが、思うように作業は進まない。そんななか、みのりはまなつたちに誘われパパイア農園を訪れる。

41.SummaryEnglish: Manatsu and her friends are discussing the story of the play to be performed at the Tropica Graduation Festival. As they reflect on their encounters with everyone and come up with ideas, they decide on a title.
41.TitleJapanese: 会議だよ！トロピカる部、集合～！
41.SummaryJapanese: 部活合同で3年生たちを送る会・トロピカ卒業フェスティバルで披露する演劇の内容を話し合うまなつたち。みんなとの出会いを振り返りながらアイデアを出し合っていくなか、決まったタイトルは...。

42.SummaryEnglish: Preparations for the "Tropica Graduation Festival" are underway throughout the school, and the Tropical Club is putting the finishing touches on their play. But then Manatsu is swallowed by one of the strongest Yarane-da she has faced so far.
42.TitleJapanese: 衝撃！最強のヤラネーダ！
42.SummaryJapanese: トロピカ卒業フェスティバルの準備が進み、トロピカる部も演劇の仕上げに取りかかる。そんななか、現れた最強のヤラネーダにまなつが飲み込まれてしまう。気を失ったまなつは夢の中で再び伝説のプリキュアと出会う。

43.TitleEnglish: Infiltrate! The Witch's Mansion At The Bottom Of The Ocean!
43.SummaryEnglish: Laura and the others head to the Witch's mansion in pursuit of Manatsu, who has been swallowed by a Yaraneeda. On the way, Laura learns the secret of the Legendary Pretty Cure from the Mermaid Queen. Meanwhile, Manatsu wakes up in the Witch of Delays' mansion...
43.TitleJapanese: 潜り込め！　深海の魔女やしき！
43.SummaryJapanese: クジラの超ゼッタイヤラネーダに飲み込まれたまなつを追って、ローラたち4人は魔女の屋敷へ向かう。その途中、人魚の女王から伝説のプリキュアと魔女の物語を聞くローラ。一方、まなつは魔女の屋敷で目を覚ます。

44.TitleEnglish: What's Most Important To The Witch
44.SummaryEnglish: The Witch of Delays has been trying to fill up the Fool's Casket, but she has forgotten what she was trying to delay. Meanwhile, Manatsu and the others learn from Laura about "the legendary Pretty Cure and the Witch's past".
44.TitleJapanese: 魔女の一番大事なこと
44.SummaryJapanese: 愚者の棺を開放しようとする魔女だったが、自分が何をあとまわしにしていたのかを忘れてしまっていた。伝説のプリキュアと魔女の過去を知ったまなつたちは...。

45.TitleEnglish: Battle of Motivation! Shine! Tropical Paradise!
45.SummaryEnglish: After reuniting with Cure Oasis, the Witch of Delays passes away, but the Butler Yarane-da has started to attack the Pretty Cure. The five Cures face Butler, vowing to do what's most important right now...!
45.TitleJapanese: やる気大決戦！輝け！トロピカルパラダイス！
45.SummaryJapanese: キュアオアシスと再会し、あとまわしの魔女は浄化されたが、ヤラネーダ化したバトラーがまなつたちに襲いかかる。チョンギーレたちと協力し、立ち向かうまなつたちだったが、バトラーは愚者の棺を開放してしまい...。

46.SummaryEnglish: Laura, who has officially been nominated as the next queen, is forced to choose between returning to Grand Ocean or staying in the human world. And then, the "Tropica Festival" begins, where the curtain finally rises on the Tropical Club's play...
46.TitleJapanese: トロピカれ！わたしたちの今！
46.SummaryJapanese: 正式に次期女王に指名されたローラは、グランオーシャンに戻るか、人間の世界にとどまるかの選択を迫られる。そんななかトロフェスが開会。トロピカる部の芝居の幕が上がり、ローラはラストシーンで別れを告げ...。
